data.name: The Graffiti Creator
data.detailed_description:
In The Graffiti Creator you can make your own graffiti designs.

Choose different fonts, color schemes, backdrops and more. There's a ton of tools to make your artwork as realistic as possible. Endless design possibilities.
When you're happy with your design you can save it and print/publish it online and show your friends.

All artworks made by MindGem, a professional full-time graffiti artist of 25 years.
data.about_the_game:
In The Graffiti Creator you can make your own graffiti designs.

Choose different fonts, color schemes, backdrops and more. There's a ton of tools to make your artwork as realistic as possible. Endless design possibilities.
When you're happy with your design you can save it and print/publish it online and show your friends.

All artworks made by MindGem, a professional full-time graffiti artist of 25 years.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 95
  • Processor: Pentium III
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 3
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS8
  • Processor: PowerPC G4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 3
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: X Server
  • Graphics: GeForce 3
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
All content in, and produced with The Graffiti Creator are copyrighted by Mike Wigen.
You're free to print/publish any artwork you produce using The Graffiti Creator for personal use or review of any aspect of the application.

You may not sell any artwork or publish any artwork in promotion for any product/service.
